title: Crime journalism in Marathi films
text:
The recently unveiled Nandita Singgha film 'Red' recently, which is set to veer around the Indian Crime Journalism, will now be dubbed in Marathi, according to a website.
"It has received overwhelming response from the audience, worldwide on social networking sites," said marathimovieworld.com, and added, "The story of this film revolves around 10 Crime Journalists from Gujarat, the land of Mahatma Gandhi , who want to expose to the world the real culprits in the J Dey murder case and the motive behind it. They are also working on various other unsolved social issues which the police and the legal system, is not able to solve."
According to the director, she wanted to portray the emotions of crime journalists through the First Look Poster. She feels that the Screenplay and Dialogues in crime based movies play a major role and hence, has focused more on the story telling process.
